experiment.logger.simple_logger module¶

class experiment.logger.simple_logger.Logger(option, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Logger

initialize()¶

This method is used to record the stastic variables that won’t change across rounds (e.g. local data size)

This method is called at the beginning of each communication round of Server. The round-wise operations of recording should be complemented here.
